content:
[ ] Scan a product, see in which places it is available
[ ] Know in which exact coord a section or product is
[ ] Map all houses/rooms available for rent, and their infos
[ ] Coordinates about rooms (cozy, sl room)
[ ] Coord about room/appartment numbers
[ ] Points (cryptocurrencies) for suggesting/verifying infos (integration with FOAM)
[ ] Equipment for AR cars to scan their routes (cheaper rides because of slow speed, bonuses for driver) with panoramic cam (integration with FOAM)
[ ] Integration with AR/Rebu (and Uber/99 client), verifying if GPS data is correct ("the detected house number is right?")
[ ] Nearby vending cars (soundless)
[ ] About (version, libs, FMWK version, license)
[ ]  
[ ] When scanning: "round all the square", "put your arms on the wall", "if there is a obstacle"
title: 0. UltraGPS
